entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who draws breath and leaves Harry's mind free to dwell on his thoughts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is thinking about his father's memory in the Pensieve.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone who made aspersions on Harry's father's character.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as one of the people who told Harry about his father's wonderful character.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone who was friends with Harry's father and was also a troublemaker at school.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as someone who described Harry's father and Sirius as forerunners of the Weasley twins.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the Weasley twins.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of the Weasley twins.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone who might deserve to be hung upside down by Fred and George.

relationships.description: Harry disbelieves Snape's aspersions on his father's character.
